vote.title: Authorize the second and final, one-year renewal options to the service contract with Senior Citizens of Greater Dallas, Inc. to provide nursing home ombudsman services, which includes: receiving, investigating and resolving complaints and assisting in obtaining goods or services for seniors residing in nursing homes and assisted living facilities within the city of Dallas for the period of October 1, 2021 through September 30, 2022 - Not to exceed $116,868.00, from $233,736 to $350,604 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the second and final, one-year renewal options to the service contract with Senior Citizens of Greater Dallas, Inc. to provide nursing home ombudsman services, which includes: receiving, investigating and resolving complaints and assisting in obtaining goods or services for seniors residing in nursing homes and assisted living facilities within the city of Dallas for the period of October 1, 2021 through September 30, 2022 - Not to exceed $116,868.00, from $233,736 to $350,604 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
